app.title: Mureka - AI Song&Music Maker
app.description:
AI-Powered Music Creation: Mureka is the ultimate AI song generator, allowing you to create personalized tracks effortlessly across genres like pop, electronic, hip-hop, jazz, and more.
- 
Choose Your Favorite Singer: Specify the singer’s gender and preferred vocal tone to make your song’s vocals truly captivating.
-
Easy to Use: With a simple and intuitive interface, anyone can craft complete lyrics and beautiful melodies—no music theory required.
-
Customizable Preferences: Tailor your music with style, moods, instruments, and more, creating songs that match your unique taste.
More Exclusive Features
-
Generate Similar Songs: Upload a reference track, and Mureka’s AI music generator will quickly create a song in a similar style, closely matching your desired vibe.
-
Record Melodic Motifs: Turn your recorded melodies into complete songs, as Mureka builds the instrumentation and arrangement around your input.

--Who’s It For?--
>Music Lovers: From beginners to pros, Mureka’s AI song generator helps you produce studio-quality tracks with ease.

>Content Creators: Perfect for video creators, podcasters, and advertisers needing original music for their projects.

>Musicians: Discover limitless inspiration for your next hit, and easily produce demos with the AI music generator’s advanced capabilities.

--Why Choose Mureka Over Suno?--

>Professional-Grade AI Music: Mureka, like Suno, uses advanced AI technology but features its own self-developed model, offering even more unique functionalities for tailored music creation. Powered by a vast library of music samples, Mureka ensures your generated tracks sound polished and innovative.

>Full Commercial Rights: Mureka provides full commercial rights for all your generated songs, making it easy to monetize your creations or use them for promotions without restrictions.

With Mureka, enjoy all the benefits of AI music generation alongside exclusive features that set it apart from Suno, ensuring a more personalized and powerful music creation experience.

Start your music journey today with Mureka—your all-in-one AI song generator and AI music generator. Unlock endless creative possibilities now!

app.summary: Easiest way to make song&music with AI

reviews.text: Tried the demo credits. I created a metal track with 2 different generations. I had a great song concept with great lyrical ideas and it came out really good! I was surprised as I am a producer of over 30 years and a DJ and I would play this song out! The only issue I had was it doesn't tell you if the subscription is monthly or annually. I assume monthly, but again it doesn't specify the term. Great App I will be subscribing to get the stems and vocals and rights to sell for sure! Great Job!

None of the music I generated with free credits was good. I would have given one more star, but it needs some usability improvements. A lot of the labels are unclear or intentionally confusing (subscriptions). And it's unclear how many songs you can create for free (not many, I think it was four).

👌 additional features to consider, 1. the ability to arrange "liked" songs into a playlist, eg, place songs in any particular order. 2. The ability to change the words "edit mode" when doing regeneration, eg. Change words in generated songs during regeneration, 3. the ability to export as wave, 4. The ability to see and edit all the tracks. Cut, paste, move, and arrange tracks

App has been playing up lately not singing the words I put in all the time... Please fix this and consider allowing to rewrite lyrics when you regenerate it,allow to chose duets for male and female or both or even a choice to make a band

I love the app. it legitimately has helped me as an amateur song writer become better. I do have some suggestions. 1. Make it possible to sort your own songs by alphabetical or custom. 2. A recycle bin would be nice. 3. The ability to see if your published songs are being heard. 4. Make the 1O 5 credits. like really 10? kinda a kick in the nuts lol. but really these are just my minor tweaks id like to see in future updates. That aside thank you.

far as I've experienced is by far the best for Ai generated music, There's been issues lately with the subscriptions I've purchased. I'm beginning to feel like I'm being robbed. There's no way to really contact the app creators about issues. I've spent over a hundred dollars for monthly and yearly subscriptions and yet again veggie the month or more credits are used up in being prompt to pay for other packages in order to create even tho it's showing my membership and credits are still active!

Pretty good. I do have a few issues. 1. Why does the download mp3 not just download it to the phone? I have had to email myself the song to properly download it since it opens share options. 2. I wish there was a male or female singer selectable option because I don't know what decides the masculine/feminine singers and I'd like to be able to choose. 3. I'd like more selectable options, because when a song is done, generating, there are generally more attributes applied than what was selected.

I really enjoy using this app, but there are some major issues I have with it. It will sometimes change YOUR OWN lyrics, adding words or deleting them. Sometimes they get horribly mispronounced. Also, there used to be a song regeneration option but it appears to be gone now and replaced with "regional editing." I have tried using this feature multiple times, and with great dismay I've given up even trying. It does NOT edit in the proper place. Ruins the song! I give up. 😪

Only get ONE FREE try to make a song. It can ignore your song suggested storyline. It can ignore your suggested music genre. It can ignore the intended mood for the song. If you choose to insert your own lyrics, it can cut off before the song is even finished. The have is just another brick in the Paywall of apps.

Rubbish. Requested refund. Paid for membership then you have to pay for additional credits if you want to chose a female or male voice. THEN on top of that, if you select ballad for example, it totally ignores your request and spits out some other genre. Poor quality voices that sound so fake. Really bad. Donna was the best app but I can no longer find it.

app.recentChanges:
- Optimized text and lyrics creation modes
- Add feedback
- Add language support: German, French, Russian, Italian
- New features: Region Editing and Audio extend
- Other minor improvements and bug fix
app.AIReview:
Mureka - AI Song & Music Maker Review

Overview

Mureka, an AI-powered music creation app, has swiftly garnered over 602,424 installs and a solid 4.6392407/5 rating from 10,556 users – figures suggesting significant interest in automated music generation. Positioning itself as “the ultimate AI song generator,” Mureka aims to democratize music creation by removing the traditional barriers of musical knowledge and complex software. The app’s core functionality revolves around generating personalized tracks across a broad range of genres including pop, electronic, hip-hop, and jazz, with an emphasis on user customization. It's offered as a free download, marking it as an accessible entry point for aspiring musicians and anyone seeking to create background music or simple songs without extensive musical training. The app’s success hinges on its ability to deliver genuinely usable AI that doesn’t produce generic, repetitive results.

Key Features

Mureka boasts several key features designed to streamline the song creation process:

  • AI Song Generation: The central feature allows users to generate tracks based on selected genres and preferences. The app leverages artificial intelligence to create both melodies and lyrical content.
  • Genre Selection: Users can choose from a diverse range of genres, including Pop, Electronic, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Rock, R&B, Country, and more, ensuring that the generated music aligns with their desired style.
  • Singer Customization (Voice Style): A standout feature is the ability to specify the singer’s gender and preferred vocal tone. This goes beyond simply selecting a genre, aiming for more nuanced and targeted musical output – potentially influencing harmonic choices and rhythmic patterns.
  • Lyric Generation: The app automatically generates lyrics based on the chosen genre and style, offering users a starting point for further refinement or complete replacement.
  • Melody Generation: Alongside lyrics, Mureka creates melodies designed to complement the lyrical content and selected genre.
  • Customizable Preferences: While details are sparse in the description, this feature suggests options for controlling tempo, key, instrumentation (though not explicitly detailed), and potentially even more granular musical parameters within the AI generation process.
  • Simple & Intuitive Interface: The app is advertised as having a user-friendly design requiring no prior music theory knowledge – a critical selling point for novices.

Strengths

  • Accessibility: The “no music theory required” claim is a significant strength, lowering the barrier to entry for individuals who lack formal musical training. This makes Mureka appealing to hobbyists and those simply looking for a quick solution for generating background music.
  • Wide Genre Support: The breadth of genres offered—from Pop to Jazz—indicates a robust AI engine capable of adapting its output to diverse musical styles. This is far more comprehensive than many competing apps that focus on limited genre selections.
  • Singer Customization Feature: The ability to define the singer’s gender and vocal tone represents an innovative approach, potentially leading to more realistic and stylistically appropriate vocals. This could be a key differentiator for Mureka.
  • High Install Count & Rating: The app's popularity (602,424 installs and 4.6392407/5 rating) strongly suggests that the core functionality is delivering on its promises to a significant user base. This level of engagement speaks to an effective marketing strategy combined with genuinely useful AI generation.

Areas for Improvement

  • Lack of Granular Control: The description mentions “Customizable Preferences” but doesn’t detail what can be customized. Users desire finer control over the generated music—e.g., specific rhythmic patterns, chord progressions beyond genre defaults, and detailed instrumentation choices.
  • Output Quality Variability: Given the relatively high install count, there’s a risk of some users experiencing inconsistent output quality. AI-generated content can be unpredictable, and improvements are needed to ensure consistently pleasant and professional results across all genres.
  • Limited Editing Capabilities: The app appears to focus solely on generation. Users would benefit from basic editing tools – the ability to adjust tempo, key, loop sections, or even subtly modify generated melodies—to refine the output beyond a simple copy-paste operation.
  • Transparency in AI Process: The description doesn't explain how the AI generates music. Providing some insight into the algorithms used would build user trust and potentially offer guidance on how to achieve better results.

User Experience

Based on user reviews, the interface is generally described as intuitive and easy to navigate. The simplicity of the design is a clear advantage for newcomers. However, without granular control options, users may find themselves repeatedly generating variations of similar tracks, suggesting the AI isn’t fully exploring creative possibilities based on their input. A cleaner workflow for saving and exporting generated songs would also improve the user experience. The app's reliance on a simple interface could be a weakness if users require more sophisticated features down the line—a potential limitation in its long-term development.

Value for Money

As a free download, Mureka offers significant value as an entry point to exploring AI music generation. The lack of paid features suggests that the developers are focused on attracting a large user base and potentially monetizing through premium features (e.g., extended song lengths, higher quality audio exports) in future updates. The current free offering provides ample opportunity for users to assess whether the app meets their needs before committing to any potential subscription model.

Conclusion

Mureka presents an intriguing proposition – accessible AI-powered music creation for everyone. The app’s strengths lie in its ease of use, broad genre support, and innovative singer customization feature. However, it's not without limitations; the lack of granular control and potential variability in output quality need to be addressed. With a focus on refining the AI engine and expanding editing capabilities, Mureka has the potential to become a truly valuable tool for both aspiring musicians and those simply seeking to create personalized music. The high install count and positive rating suggest that it’s already achieving some of its goals, but continued development is crucial to fully realize its promise as "the ultimate AI song generator."
